Text:
To the peers of this movie: 

Since I uploaded this file, I have seeded it up to a ratio of 75.0, yet I am still the sole seeder. :(

If you download this, please help everyone who wants this file by seeding it, at least for a little while. This would help to make it a faster and more accessible download for all. 

Bedankt to the seeders! ~kimeesteres  :)
p.s. Sorry that the audio on this movie is a bit shitty. It does get somewhat better as the movie progresses...

NOTE: THIS TORRENT HAS BEEN RE-UPLOADED!

Please go here instead:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6634469/Born_Innocent_%28Made_for_TV_-_1974%29

Thanks for your understanding and patience.
